title: Board Render Performance
statement: Board must render 200 tasks across 4 columns without dropping below 60fps during scroll.
constraints: Measured in Chrome DevTools Performance tab
No frame may exceed 16ms render time with 200 cards visible

steps: Seed database with 200 tasks distributed across 4 columns
Record while scrolling through all columns

metadata.rationale: Active projects can have 100+ tasks; janky scrolling is unacceptable.
